towns.name: Playa Chen Rio
towns.description: An incredibly gorgeous beach in Cozumel. The white sands and warm air will have you coming back over and over.

towns.name: Los Cinco Soles
towns.description: A charming market in town where all sorts of hancrafted souvenirs and momentos can be purchased. Be sure to stop here to take your trip home with you.

towns.name: Punta Sur Ecological Park
towns.description: Punta Sur is a haven of natural beauty. With its beaches, flora, and wildlife, you'll be swept away in the wonders of Cozumel.

towns.name: La Candela
towns.description: La Candela is a must visit restaurant if you're looking for an authentic Mexican food experience. The friendly staff will make you feel like family!
